Alter Object.Description: This action is used to alter the Object in context of the current line.
Alter Object.Name: Alter Object

Display Object.Description: This action is used to display the object in the context of the current line.
Display Object.Name: Display Object

Field Accept.Description: This action is used to accept and validate the data within the field.
Field Accept.Name: Field Accept

Field Backspace.Description: This action is used to delete the previous character.

Meta.Aliases: Field Backspace, Field Char Delete Left

Field Backspace.Name: Field Backspace

Field Blank.Description: This action is used to erase the contents of the current Field at a stretch without hitting the Backspace or Delete Key.
Field Blank.Name: Field Blank

Field Char Delete.Description: This action is used to delete the current character.
Field Char Delete.Name: Field Char Delete

Field Char Left.Description: This action is used to move the cursor to previous character.
Field Char Left.Name: Field Char Left

Field Char Right.Description: This action is used to move the cursor to next character.
Field Char Right.Name: Field Char Right

Field Copy.Description: This action is used to copy the current field (Field where the cursor is positioned) contents to the OS clipboard and it will be available later.
Field Copy.Name: Field Copy

Field End.Description: This action takes the cursor to last character and it is applicable only in edit mode.
Field End.Name: Field End

Field Home.Description: This action takes the cursor to first character and it is applicable only in edit mode.
Field Home.Name: Field Home

Field Insert Mode.Description: This action will toggle insert mode while entering data in the field.
Field Insert Mode.Name: Field Insert Mode

Field New Line.Description: This is used to Insert a blank line after this field.
Field New Line.Name: Field New Line

Field Paste.Description: This action is used to paste the clipboard contents to the current Field.
Field Paste.Name: Field Paste

Field Sub Form.Description: This action is used to open the subform.
Field Sub Form.Name: Field Sub Form

Field Table Accept.Description: Accept the item in the table
Field Table Accept.Name: Field Table Accept

Field Table Maximize.Description: During table search it will autofill with maximum matching characters that are common within currently hilighted lines.
Field Table Maximize.Name: Field Table Maximize

Field Table Mode.Description: This action will toggle Table Mode when a table is associated with the field.
Field Table Mode.Name: Field Table Mode

Field Toggle case.Description: This action will toggle case of the field from defined case to normal and viceversa.
Field Toggle case.Name: Field Toggle case

Field Undo.Description: This action is used to discard the edited field value and restore the previous value.
Field Undo.Name: Field Undo

Field Word Delete.Description: This action is used to delete the current word which is identified by the cursor position.
Field Word Delete.Name: Field Word Delete

Field Word Delete Left.Description: This action is used to delete the previous word.
Field Word Delete Left.Name: Field Word Delete Left

Field Word Delete Right.Description: This action is used to delete the next word.
Field Word Delete Right.Name: Field Word Delete Right

Field Word Left.Description: This action is used to position the cursor to the  previous word.
Field Word Left.Name: Field Word Left

Field Word Right.Description: This action is used to position the cursor to the next word.
Field Word Right.Name: Field Word Right

Line Delete.Description: This action is used to delete contents of current line within the Field.
Line Delete.Name: Line Delete

Line Delete Left.Description: This action is used to delete the contents to the left of cursor position within a field.
Line Delete Left.Name: Line Delete Left

Line Delete Right.Description: This action is used to delete the contents to the right of cursor position within a field.
Line Delete Right.Name: Line Delete Right

Line Down.Description: This action is used to move the cursor to the next line.
Line Down.Name: Line Down

Line End.Description: This action is used to take the cursor to the last character within the current line and it is applicable only in Edit mode.
Line End.Name: Line End

Line Home.Description: This action is used to take the cursor to the first character within the current line and it is applicable only in Edit mode.
Line Home.Name: Line Home

Line Up.Description: This action is used to position the cursor in previous line.
Line Up.Name: Line Up
